segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, glistening under the afternoon light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It fills me with a sense of dread, knowing it will cause damage if no one notices soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused, her mind on the plate as if nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think how easy it is to get lost in the mundane tasks of daily life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then there are the children, who are so brazen and carefree, it brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a bit angry at the situation; they are breaking the rules right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s something endearing about their partnership in crime, almost like a little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
